Entries.default: "Sure, might as well. I mean, if I were the leader, like a Watcher or something, maybe I would choose to lead by example, but... "
"Of course. I will lead the way."
"Take the lead on this one, captain. I'm not too fond of heights."
"Don't suppose we ain't descending the crusty old line into the icy abyss..."
"The angles of the ruins indicate outward expansion, suggesting we're above the source of the ice."
"I'll be, uh, bringin' up the rear if you don't mind."
"This brings me back to the time Arkemyr pushed me off his roof."
"That looks very deep. Can I go first?"
